ModMetaData.name: Stockpile Stack Limit
ModMetaData.author: Ilyaki
ModMetaData.description:
Allows you to set a limit on the total item stack per stockpile.
Save friendly!
Mod compatibility notes: - If you have Pick Up And Haul installed, make sure Stockpile Stack Limit is loaded afterwards.
v1.1.0 Changelog: - Removed log spam. - Fixed bugs with large stockpiles and multiple colonists hauling. - Fixed limits on hoppers - (Very) Big optimisations.
v1.2.0 Changelog: - Fixed NullRef errors.
